articles.title: What Americans are debating about India as Modi visits Washington: Human rights or counter to China? - Scroll.in
articles.description: Modi’s state visit to Washington will be the first by an Indian leader in 14 years.
articles.content:
On Wednesday, Prime Minister Narendra Modi will arrive in the United States on a state visit, signifying a major strengthening of ties between Delhi and Washington.
